title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 690.14 - Decision or report following hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 690.14 - Decision or report following hearing

State Regulations

Where the hearing has been conducted
by the committee, the committee shall render a decision, and where the hearing
has been conducted by a subcommittee, the subcommittee shall render a report, within 60 days after the matter is finally submitted, unless the time is
extended by consent of the applicant or order of the Appellate Division. The
decision of the committee or the report of the subcommittee, as the case may
be, may recommend approval or disapproval of the applicant or deferral of
action on the application for a period not to exceed six
months. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
690.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
